# Load packages
```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)


```

# Load data
```{r}

data <- read_csv("2020heights.csv")
head(data)


```

# Histograms
```{r}

ggplot(data, aes(x=heights)) + geom_histogram()

ggplot(data, aes(x=heights)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 10)

ggplot(data, aes(x=heights)) + geom_histogram(color="red", fill="pink")

```
The histogram looks ...

# Modify data
```{r}

data <- data %>% mutate(a=mean(heights)) %>% arrange(heights)

```
